summary: A comprehensive Django test suite that validates model and form data handling, covering custom assertion helpers, lightweight test models, custom and default error messages, picklability of ValidationError, unique constraint enforcement, and integration of custom validators across a wide range of field types.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and robustness of Django's validation framework within the project, preventing data integrity issues and regressions by automatically testing error messaging, uniqueness rules, serialization support, and custom validation logic.
